author: Staff Reporter
text:
Following dispute between two groups over the conduct of temple festival in Senthamangalam, Revenue Divisional Officer M. Kannan has banned the festival until elections are completed.

Chellandiamman temple was located in Kuttarangampatti in Sendamangalam. Last year, clash erupted between two groups over the conduct of festival. A case was also filed in the court on the ownership of the temple. With festival dates nearing, a meeting was held last week to sort out the issue. RDO chaired the meeting, but the talks failed.

Again talks were held a few days ago which also failed. Hence, the RDO banned the festival until elections were over and also the judgement in the case delivered.
title: Temple festival banned
